description:
Pance Karmer is an out-of-luck ex-Ostanian military man who now works as a security guard.
Due to growing frustration following the end of the East-West war he tried to assassinate http://anidb.net/ch151955 [Jonas Wellman]. He was stopped in the knick of time due to the actions of http://anidb.net/ch122757 [Sylvia Sherwood] and her agents, including http://anidb.net/ch151956 [Kebab].
name: Pance Karmer
